link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

va:valueAssertion.test: not(empty($V2)) and not(empty($V3)) and not(empty($V4)) and not(empty($V5)) and not(empty($V6)) and not(empty($V7)) and not(empty($V8)) and not(empty($V9)) and not(empty($V10)) and not(empty($V11)) and not(empty($V12)) and not(empty($V13)) and not(empty($V14)) and not(empty($V15))

generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of fields “Loan to asset value ratio”, “Income to instalment ratio”, “Solvency Margin”, “Premium written”, “Persistency ratio”, “Proportion of Total Expenses of Management to Total Premium (to be reported on annual basis)”, “Ratio of Policyholders Liabilities to Shareholders funds”, “Conservation Ratio”, “Reinsurance-Net Retention Ratio”, “Average Assets Under Management”, “No of folios/clients” and “No of subscribers”is mandatory.
Reporting of fields “Loan to asset value ratio" and “Income to instalment ratio”is mandatory.
Reporting of "Loan to asset value ratio" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Income to instalment ratio" is mandatory.
Reporting of fields “Original issuer of the paper / security, if applicable”, “Tenor of the Transactions (in days)”, “Amount” and “Return / yield on the investment (in %)”is mandatory.
Reporting of fields “Original issuer of the paper / security, if applicable” and “Tenor of the Transactions (in days)”is mandatory.
Reporting of fields “Tenor of the Transactions (in days)” and “Amount” is mandatory.
Reporting of fields“Amount” and “Tenor of the Transactions (in days)”is mandatory.
Reporting of fields “Nature of Transactions “, “Tenor of the Transactions (in days)” and “Amount”is mandatory.
Reporting of fields “Nature of Transactions “ and “Tenor of the Transactions (in days)”is mandatory.

Reporting of fields “Amount” and “Remarks : Reasons for funds outflow such as interest paid on loans/deposits, rate of interest on loans/deposits, details on nature of services received for fee/commission/brokerage paid " is mandatory.

Reporting of fields “Remarks : Reasons for funds outflow such as interest paid on loans/deposits, rate of interest on loans/deposits, details on nature of services received for fee/commission/brokerage paid etc. to be indicated”and “Amount”is mandatory.
Reporting of fields “Tenor of the Transactions (in days)” and “Amount”is mandatory.
Reporting of fields “Tenor of the Transactions (in days)” and “Amount”is mandatory.

Reporting of fields “Amount” and “Remarks : Reasons for funds outflow such as interest paid on loans/deposits, rate of interest on loans/deposits, details on nature of services received for fee/commission/brokerage paid etc. to be indicated”]
